metadata.title: CVE-2017-11333 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The vorbis_analysis_wrote function in lib/block.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis1.3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (OOM) via acrafted wav file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11333` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.5-4.1
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.5-4.1
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.5-4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-4.1').
